description: Derick was all smiles all day, and it took Shaw by surprise…in a good way, of course! He was excited to try out more new things with another hot guy, so Shaw took that as an opportunity to let Derick know he could do whatever he wanted to him, “Well, don’t hold back. I’m pretty much telling you that you can do whatever, however…I mean, it’s your show man!” Derick jokingly responded, “I’ve always wanted my own show.” Back at the house, Derick took full advantage of what Shaw had said earlier and did what he wanted to that ass, leaving Shaw wanting more!
title: Derick & Shaw: Bareback
